Articles.Content: I'm Male, so, is everybody here male, or....?
Past threads have shown the majority of forumers are male, but the amount of females is definitely not negligible.
I grow my arm really long and a smaller me grows from my palm, much like a strawberry.

I've made a poll on this a while back. I shouldn't have put "other" because trolls took advantage of it and skewed the results.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/50083-What-s-your-%2A%2A%2A

There is a very small number of females around here, and most of them are in fact lying they're male. Supposedly there were cases of stalking and online abusing them by sexually frustrated forum members who can't get laid, so they drool over anyone who presents as female. It's quite sad.

And yes, the correct question is "what's your s-e-x", not gender. *** is a biologically correct term, and I'm not sure why is it censored. This forum has turned into a nanny state place recently.

My genders .... at the moment I have only one, which is male ... never thought about getting a second one

Edited June 22, 2014 by Godot
I identify as a trans-objective-humanoid M249 Machine Gun.
I am male. Or more like a boy still...
Biologically I'm male but gender-wise I'm bigender.

*Raises hand*

Is mayonnaise a gender?

No, Patrick, mayonnaise is not a gender.

@lajo O_O Terrifying!

-Duxwing

Harassment on the KSP forum?

THAT'S THE WAY WE WASH OUR HANDS FALALALALALALALALA

Sometimes my faith in humanity hits such a low that I have to dig down to make room.

Harassment on the KSP forum?

THAT'S THE WAY WE WASH OUR HANDS FALALALALALALALALA

Sometimes my faith in humanity hits such a low that I have to dig down to make room.

After some thought, the harassment can be understood: surveys of KSP forum-goers indicate that we are almost only young, nerdy, introverted guys. Interacting with ourselves long enough via this forum, which aids and abets our natural tendencies and stifles misbehavior, we may eventually believe our tendencies normal and environment safe. We may therefore also not expect those tendencies to cause some of us to misbehave, and hence our shock at the sexual-frustration-driven harassment.

-Duxwing
I am a blob of sentient jelly piloting a mech made of meat and bones. Just don't ask.
A huge cacti, or maybe a trombone...
